definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: A scene in a studio can be captured on film.
sentences.chinese: 摄影棚内的场景可以拍到软片上。

sentences.english: Imperfect transmission is the glass or film upon which the emulsion is coated.
sentences.chinese: 涂乳胶的玻璃片或软片不完全透明。

sentences.english: We could tell from one look that the photo was shot with panchromatic film.
sentences.chinese: 一眼就能看出来，这张照片是用全色软片拍摄的。

sentences.english: Developer , Fixer no liquid can also cause the film to the right.
sentences.chinese: 不退影液的淡度不不合也能致使软片发黄。

sentences.english: Next time, these tablets will be the FIRST thing I use!
sentences.chinese: 下一次，感冒软片就是首先拉。

definition: acrylic (loanword)/see also 亞克力|亚克力[ya4 ke4 li4]
film/roll of film/also written 膠捲|胶卷
intaglio printing plate (or a print made with it)
